About the Mussalah
You are cordially invited to join the Islamic Center of Newfoundland and Labrador. This was established in 2012. This Mussalah is located at St. Johnâ€™s, NL. Enjoy five times prayers, Jumma, Special Ramadan events, Quran classes, excellent iftar meals in Ramadan, great social community gatherings, and learning and teaching of our Prophet Mohammad Sallaho Aleh wasalam( May Allah Peace be upon him). It is all happening be a part of it.
Our Vision
Educate, learn, and remind the teaching of our role model Mohammad SWS and leave an everlasting legacy for generations to come. Education is the backbone of a successful society
